title: % Renewable Electricity by Country – Visualized!
dc:creator: David McCandless
description: Over 30% of the world’s demand is now met by solar, wind, hydro, geothermal, bioenergy etc – and it’s increasing. But there are some caveats. » See the visualisation of country and US state data » Play with the VizSweet interactive » Review the data Source: US Energy Information Administration (eia.gov)
content:encoded:
Over 30% of the world’s demand is now met by solar, wind, hydro, geothermal, bioenergy etc – and it’s increasing.

But there are some caveats.

» See the visualisation of country and US state data
» Play with the VizSweet interactive
» Review the data

Source: US Energy Information Administration (eia.gov)
